Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 84 runs off 45 balls.
Sri Lanka won by 4 wickets with 5 balls remaining.
Dilshan Madushanka took 2 wickets for 36 runs.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took 2 wickets for 30 runs.
Bhanuka Rajapaksa scored 31 runs off 14 balls.
Kusal Mendis scored 36 runs off 19 balls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahmanullah Gurbaz was named Player of the Match.
Sri Lanka elected to field first after winning the toss.
